content.prompt: Which of the following explains the historical situation that led Lodge to deliver the speech in the excerpt?

choices.label: The United States came to control new colonial possessions after the Spanish-American War.
The United States negotiated territorial exchanges with Germany to end the First World War.
The United States invaded Pacific islands as a means to defeat Japan in the Second World War.
The United States sought continued employment overseas for veterans of wars with Native Americans.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
